p: To assess the combined effects of nisin and the EO, fractional inhibitory concentration (FIC) value was used [ 15] as follows: Eight concentrations (five concentrations less than the MIC value, one equal with the MIC value, and two concentrations more than the MIC value) of H. persicum EO and nisin were prepared according to the microdilution method. Then, 140 μl BHI broth, 20 μl of bacterial suspension (final dose in each well: 1.5×10 5), 20 mL of the EO concentrations, and 20 μl of nisin concentrations were poured into each well. The microplates were shaken for 30 s at 2500 rpm and incubated at 35°C for 24 h.
